Package edu.ncsu.csc216.product_backlog.model.task

Class Task

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.product_backlog.model.task.Task
public class Task extends Object
Task class that contains all of the methods needed for controlling the task state. Has constants representing the States of the class and the type of class. This class contains a private interface and 6 private classes
Author:
Ethan Browne

  • Constructor Details

    • Task

      public Task(int id, String title, Task.Type type, String creator, String note)
      Creates a task
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the task
      title - the title of the task
      type - the type of task
      creator - the creator of the task
      note - the details of the task
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the id is zero or less
      IllegalArgumentException - If any of parameters are empty strings or null

    • Task

      public Task(int id, String state, String title, String type, String creator, String owner, String verified, ArrayList<String> notes)
      Creates a task
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the task
      state - the state of the task
      title - the title of the task
      type - the type of task
      creator - the creator of the task
      owner - the owner of the task
      verified - whether or not the task is verified
      notes - the details of the task
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the id is zero or less
      IllegalArgumentException - If any of parameters are empty strings or null
